title: Implement Projects Feature
description: Develop the ability to group tasks into projects. This includes creating, renaming, and deleting projects, as well as assigning tasks to a project.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new project.
Users can rename an existing project.
Users can delete a project.
Users can assign a task to a project.
Users can view all tasks within a specific project.

title: Implement Task Priorities
description: Add a priority level to each task (e.g., low, medium, high). This will help users identify which tasks are most important.
acceptance_criteria: Users can set a priority for a task.
The task's priority is visually indicated in the UI.
Users can change the priority of a task.

title: Implement Due Dates
description: Allow users to add a due date to each task. This will help users keep track of deadlines and manage their time more effectively.
acceptance_criteria: Users can assign a due date to a task.
The due date is displayed in the task details.
The application sends a notification when a task is approaching its due date.

title: Implement Subtasks
description: Enable users to break down a task into smaller, more manageable subtasks. This will help users track the progress of a task and stay organized.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add subtasks to a task.
Users can mark a subtask as complete.
The progress of a task is visually represented based on its completed subtasks.

title: Implement Search & Filtering
description: Add a search bar and filtering options to help users find specific tasks. Users should be able to filter tasks by status, priority, or due date.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for a task by its title.
Users can filter tasks by their status.
Users can filter tasks by their priority.
Users can filter tasks by their due date.

title: Implement Theming
description: Allow users to switch between a light and dark theme. This will improve the user experience and reduce eye strain.
acceptance_criteria: Users can switch between a light and dark theme.
The selected theme is saved in `localStorage` and applied on subsequent visits.
